name: Leading Ridge Capital Partners
overview: Leading Ridge Capital Partners is a private investment firm headquartered in the Washington DC Metropolitan Area with an office in New York City. Formed by a seasoned leadership team with extensive experience in growing product manufacturing and distribution firms, Leading Ridge specializes in acquisitions, investments and recapitalizations of lower-middle market businesses with revenues between $10 and $50 million.

milestones.description: Leading Ridge Capital Partners Acquires Blue Raven Technology
milestones.source_description: Leading Ridge Capital Partners Acquires Blue Raven Technology
